channel.title: Instant-Pot on Matt's Musings
channel.description: Recent content in Instant-Pot on Matt's Musings

item.title: Autumn Chowder
item.description: Ingredients # 1/2 lbs uncured bacon olive oil 1 large onion, diced 2 cups sliced carrots 4 stalks celery, sliced 2 cloves garlic, mined 4 cups potatoes, peeled and diced 3 cups chicken stock 1 cup/cob of corn 1/2 tsp dried thyme 2 bay leaves 1 tsp salt 1/4 tsp pepper olive oil 1/2 stick unsalted butter 1/4 cup flour 2 cups milk Directions # Add bacon to instant pot, saut√© (level 3-4) and fry until crisp on both sides.

item.title: Instant Pot Mac & Cheese
item.description: Ingredients # 2 tbsp butter 2 cups cheddar cheese 2 cups chicken stock 3 cups elbow macaroni 1 tbsp mustard 2 tbsp parmesan 1/8 tsp pepper 1/4 tsp salt 4 ounces velveeta 1 cup water Directions # Add elbow macaroni, chicken stock, water, butter, parmesan, salt and pepper to the instant pot.

item.title: Lemon Chicken Orzo Soup
item.description: Ingredients # 1 cup diced onion 2 cups diced carrots 3 cloves garlic, minced 1/2 tsp dried Italian seasoning 1 lb.

item.title: Shrimp Creole
item.description: Ingredients # 14 oz Rotel 1 cup chicken broth 1 onion, diced 3 stalks celery, sliced 1 bell pepper, diced 1-1/2 tbsp creole seasoning 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce 2 tbsp minced garlic 2 lbs frozen, peeled and de-veined raw medium shrimp 1 cup rice Directions # Mix the rotel, broth, onion, celery, bell pepper, creole seasoning, Worcestershire sauce and garlic in the instant pot.
